Html:
Hi, guys, any idea when the next MSI is due?

We're running into an occasional bottleneck with errors such as
Types 'foo' and 'bar' originating in infinitely expanding type reference do not refer to the same named type
and would like to see if this (and a few other minor bugs) has been fixed.

Thanks!
TS Team, is there going to be a 0.9.7 release? The branch stopped getting commits 5 days ago and it looks like release 1.0 is actively being checked into now.

Just as a FYI the bug that was generating the "infinitely expanding type.." error through a spurious nominal comparison appears to have been fixed.

Thanks!
